detailedSummary: Basic colors in French: rouge (red), bleu (blue), vert (green), jaune (yellow), noir (black), blanc (white), gris (gray), marron (brown), orange (orange), rose (pink).
whyItMatters: Mastering Colors: Rouge, Bleu, Vert, Jaune is essential for building a strong foundation in french - these basic concepts are the first building blocks for all future language learning.
